cluster.description: Name of the Solana cluster to target. This field is mutually exclusive with `endpoint`.

endpoint.description: The RPC endpoint for the target Solana cluster. This field is mutually exclusive with `cluster`.

data.description: Data associated with the account, either as encoded binary data or JSON depending on the value of `encoding`.

encoding.description: Desired encoding for returned transaction data (`json`, `jsonParsed`, `base58`, `base64`). Defaults to `base64`.

executable.description: Indicates whether the account contains a program.

lamports.description: Number of lamports assigned to the account.

owner.description: Base-58 encoded public key of the program the account is assigned to.

public_key.description: Base-58 encoded public key of the account to query.

rent_epoch.description: The epoch at which this account will next owe rent.

block.description: [(JSON RPC)](https://docs.solana.com/developing/clients/jsonrpc-api#getaccountinfo) Provides all information associated with the account of the provided public key

address.description: Account address as a base-58 encoded string.

results.description: A list of transaction signature information, ordered from newest to oldest transaction.

after.description: Search until this transaction signature or the response limit is reached.

before.description: Start searching backwards from this transaction signature. If not provided the search starts from the top of the highest max confirmed block.

limit.description: Maximum transaction signatures to return (between 1 and 1,000). Defaults to `500`.

block.description: Optional parameters to define a custom search time box for the signatures.

[(JSON RPC)](https://docs.solana.com/developing/clients/jsonrpc-api#getsignaturesforaddress) Returns confirmed signatures for transactions involving an address backwards in time from the provided signature or most recent confirmed block.

balance.description: The balance of the queried account.

public_key.description: Base-58 encoded public key of the account to query.

block.description: [(JSON RPC)](https://docs.solana.com/developing/clients/jsonrpc-api#getbalance) Provides the balance of the account of the provided public key.

absolute_slot.description: The current absolute slot in the epoch.

slot_index.description: The current slot relative to the start of the current epoch.

slots_in_epoch.description: The number of slots in this epoch.

block.description: [(JSON RPC)](https://docs.solana.com/developing/clients/jsonrpc-api#getepochinfo) Provides all of the relevant information about the current epoch.

public_key.description: The identity public key of the current node as a base-58 encoded string.

block.description: [(JSON RPC)](https://docs.solana.com/developing/clients/jsonrpc-api#getidentity) Provides the identity public key for the current node.

blockhash.description: Base-58 encoded hash string of the block.

lamports_per_signature.description: The lamports cost per signature of the block.

block.description: [(JSON RPC)](https://docs.solana.com/developing/clients/jsonrpc-api#getrecentblockhash) Retrieves a recent block hash from the ledger and the associated cost in lamports per signature on a new transaction for that block.

data_length.description: The length of the data stored in the account.

lamports.description: The calculated minimum cost of rent exemption for the account size.

block.description: [(JSON RPC)](https://docs.solana.com/developing/clients/jsonrpc-api#getminimumbalanceforrentexemption) Provides the minimum balance required to make an account rent exempt in lamports.

confirmations.description: Number of blocks since the signature confirmation and finalized by a supermajority of the cluster. If `-1` then it is the root.

search_transaction_history.description: If `true`, a Solana node will search its ledger cache for the signature if not found in the recent status cache. Defaults to `false`.

signature.description: The transaction signature to confirm status as a base-58 encoded string.

slot.description: The slot the transaction was processed.

status.description: The transaction's cluster confirmation status (`processed`, `confirmed`, or `finalized`).

block.description: [(JSON RPC)](https://docs.solana.com/developing/clients/jsonrpc-api#getsignaturestatuses) Provides the status for the inputted signature.
[(JSON RPC)](https://docs.solana.com/developing/clients/jsonrpc-api#getsupply) Provides information about the current supply on the network.

amount.description: The raw total token supply without decimals.

decimals.description: Number of base-10 digits to the right of the decimal place.

minter_public_key.description: Public key of the token Mint to query as a base-58 encoded string.

ui_amount.description: The total token supply using mint-prescribed decimals

block.description: [(JSON RPC)](https://docs.solana.com/developing/clients/jsonrpc-api#gettokensupply) Provides details about the total supply of an SPL Token type.

block_time.description: The estimated production time as a Unix timestamp of when the transaction was processed.

encoding.description: Desired encoding for returned transaction data (`json`, `jsonParsed`, `base58`, `base64`). Defaults to `base64`.

signature.description: Transaction signature as a base-58 encoded string.

slot.description: The slot in which the transaction was processed.

block.description: [(JSON RPC)](https://docs.solana.com/developing/clients/jsonrpc-api#gettransaction) Provides the details for a confirmed transaction.

feature_set.description: A unique identifier of the current software's feature set.

solana_core.description: Software version of `solana-core` running on the node.

block.description: [(JSON RPC)](https://docs.solana.com/developing/clients/jsonrpc-api#getversion) Provides the current Solana software version running on the network node.
